scripts.compile:app: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.app.json && resolve-tspaths && gulp assets
scripts.compile:tools: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.tools.json && resolve-tspaths && gulp assets
scripts.deploy-commands:development: npm run compile:tools && node dist/_tools/deploy-commands development
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate && npm run compile:app
scripts.generate: rimraf src/generated && rimraf src/shared && mkdirp src/generated src/shared && copyfiles -e "../backend/src/generated/typetta.ts" -f "../backend/src/generated/**/*" "src/generated" && copyfiles -u 4 "../backend/src/shared/**/*" "src/shared"
